item.title: Knowledge DAG
item.description: If I have some specific problem to solve, I find technology that seems relevant, then I scan the Internet for some basic introduction, then some tutorial, then documentation. My usual problem is that the issue I want to solve is usually not in the introduction nor the tutorial. I rarely find ready-to-use solution and unfortunately I tend to really dislike adjusting my idea to what you can easily achieve with tutorial-like solutions.
